entry.title: A Post Quantum Migration Proposal
entry.summary: Saint Wenhao raised concerns regarding the proposed solution for Bitcoin's migration issue, particularly questioning the effectiveness of implementing a quantum-safe signature scheme without prior commitment to a dual signature setup. This critique highlights the inherent challenge in enabling the spending of currently locked funds under the new security protocol. The main issue identified is that adopting such a quantum-resistant mechanism might inadvertently replicate the original migration problem it aims to solve. This discussion underscores the complexities involved in transitioning Bitcoin to a more secure framework against quantum computing threats without causing disruption to existing fund accessibility and overall network operations.
